alert.note: Alert for Kanabec; Mille Lacs; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 10:46AM CDT until May 12 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KANABEC...NORTHERN MILLE LACS AND EAST CENTRAL MORRISON COUNTIES... At 1045 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Onamia, or 14 miles south of Mille Lacs Lake, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Onamia around 1050 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Isle and Wahkon. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Lake Mille Lacs, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
